name: The Abduction of Oscar Z
overview:
This game originally presented to the CPCRetroDev 2017 competition, is an arcade game where a boy, stolen from planet Earth along with some of his farm’s animals, tries to escape from an evil, yet somewhat clumsy alien.

The action integrates different fast-paced dynamics where Oscar will have to fight for his life on endless, exotic landscapes avoiding UFO attacks, hostile birds and clumsy native beings while collecting precious energy items to survive. The game features smooth frame rates, a great soundtrack and music, and finally mode 0 with gorgeous 16 colors.
